title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Example-Based Problem Sequence Learning for Enhancing Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Concepts in Social Sciences and Foundational Data Analysis Skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can decompose a given social problem into three or more levels to derive core causes
Learners can apply appropriate problem-solving strategies to similar situations with 80% accuracy after analyzing example cases
Learners can propose two or more creative solutions based on real-world cases presented in formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
